SEARCH
Package src.feedback.suggestions

Class SuggestionEditor

java.lang.Object
src.feedback.suggestions.SuggestionEditor
public class SuggestionEditor extends Object
The SuggestionEditor class provides methods for managing and editing suggestions made by the camp committee. It includes functionalities such as creating new suggestions, editing existing suggestions, and deleting suggestions.

This class is part of the feedback and suggestion module in the application.

Since:
2023-11-24
Version:
1.0
Author:
Shun Ping

  • Constructor Details

    • SuggestionEditor

      public SuggestionEditor()

  • Method Details

    • suggestionMaker

      public static void suggestionMaker(CampInfo selectedCamp, User activeUser, ArrayList<Suggestion> suggestionList)
      Allows a camp committee member to create a new suggestion for a selected camp. The user provides a short description of the suggestion and selects a category for the suggested change. The suggestion is then added to the list of suggestions for the camp.
      Parameters:
      selectedCamp - The camp for which the suggestion is being made.
      activeUser - The camp committee member making the suggestion.
      suggestionList - The list of suggestions to which the new suggestion is added.

    • changeCategoryValue

      public static void changeCategoryValue(ArrayList<Suggestion> suggestionList, Suggestion suggestion)
      Allows the user to change the category and value of a suggestion. The user selects a new category for the suggested change, enters the new value, and the suggestion is updated accordingly.
      Parameters:
      suggestionList - The list of suggestions containing the suggestion to be modified.
      suggestion - The suggestion to be modified.

    • showSuggestionEditorMenu

      public static void showSuggestionEditorMenu()
      Displays the menu of available suggestion categories for the user to choose from.

    • editMenu

      public static void editMenu(CampCommittee commUser, ArrayList<Suggestion> suggestionList)
      Displays the menu for editing suggestions for a camp committee member. The user can choose to edit the selected suggestion, delete it, select a new suggestion, or exit the menu.
      Parameters:
      commUser - The camp committee member performing the edit.
      suggestionList - The list of suggestions to be managed.

    • editSuggestion

      public static void editSuggestion(Suggestion suggestion, ArrayList<Suggestion> SuggestionList)
      Edits a suggestion based on the user's choice. The user can choose to edit the description or the suggestion category/value.
      Parameters:
      suggestion - The suggestion to be edited.
      suggestionList - The list of suggestions containing the suggestion to be edited.

    • deleteSuggestion

      public static void deleteSuggestion(CampCommittee commUser, Suggestion suggestion, ArrayList<Suggestion> SuggestionList)
      Deletes a suggestion. The user is prompted to confirm the deletion, and if confirmed, the suggestion is removed from the list of suggestions, and the user's points are decreased.
      Parameters:
      commUser - The camp committee member performing the deletion.
      suggestion - The suggestion to be deleted.
      suggestionList - The list of suggestions containing the suggestion to be deleted.
